channel.title: Steam Black Mesa - Gib system (Any way to toggle it on or off?)
channel.description: I launched the game as soon as I finished installing it and while in options I noticed there is no Enable/Disable Creature Gib in the Black Mesa tab like it used to on the mod version of the game. Is it coming back anytime soon? A console command would also be helpful. Another thing worth taking notice is how Auto-aim keeps getting re-enabled whenever I exit and re-enter the game.
